feature1.explanation: Both texts use parentheses and hyphens for additional information and clarification.

overall.explanation: Considering the commonalities in punctuation style, lexical and grammatical features, sentence structure and coherence, text and discourse features, as well as the absence of spelling errors, there is a moderate to high likelihood that the two texts were written by the same author.
